title: Short-term debt (% of total reserves)
name: dt.dod.dstc.ir.zs
readme: Short-term debt includes all debt having an original maturity of one year or less and interest in arrears on long-term debt. Total reserves includes gold.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Short-term debt includes all debt having an original maturity of one year or less and interest in arrears on long-term debt. Total reserves includes gold.
